mapper.select: SELECT v.vdr_name , v.vdr_code , v.biz_no , (SELECT emp_name FROM employees e WHERE e.emp_id = v.emp_id) emp_id , v.credit_price , v.credit_bal_price , v.credit_period , get_credit_status(credit_bal_price, credit_price ) status , (SELECT MAX(c.update_date) FROM chit c JOIN orders o ON ord_code = article_code WHERE o.vdr_code = v.vdr_code AND c.status = 'cst04') AS createdDate FROM vender v WHERE v.com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY v.vdr_code

SELECT l.article_code articleCode , l.chit_code , l.change_type type , getSubCode(l.change_type) AS typeName , l.before_amt , l.after_amt creditBalPrice , l.change_amt totPrice , l.changed_at createdDate , l.note , l.com_id , getEmpName(v.emp_id, #{comId}) as emp_id , getEmpName(c.phy_emp_id, #{comId}) as phy_emp_id FROM chit c JOIN VENDER_TRADE_LOG l ON c.chit_code = l.chit_code JOIN VENDER v ON l.vdr_code = v.vdr_code WHERE l.vdr_code = #{vdrCode} AND l.com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY l.changed_at DESC

SELECT * FROM credit WHERE com_id = #{comId}
AND vdr_name LIKE '%'||#{vdrName}||'%'
AND vdr_code LIKE '%'||#{vdrCode}||'%'
AND arrears LIKE '%'||#{arrears}||'%'
AND emp_id LIKE '%'||#{empId}||'%'
ORDER BY vdr_code DESC
